text: Megyn Kelly is struggling to fill out her TODAY studio, RadarOnline. com can exclusively reveal! “ First, she can ’ t get A - list guests and now she can ’ t get an audience! ” an insider told Radar. “ They are having such trouble getting an audience to her live show that they are now getting Megyn to ask viewers to visit Today. com / MegynToday for tickets — on her show! ” the insider added. “ She ’ s literally now giving live shout outs on air to try and get a studio audience. ” “ Rachel Ray and Kelly [ Ripa ] and Ryan [ Seacrest ] have a six month waiting list, and it ’ s almost impossible to get into Wendy Williams ’ and Jimmy Fallon ‘ s audience, ” the insider
